args.natural_language_statement: Let z ∈ ℂ with |z| < 1. Show that ∑_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n = |z|/(1-|z|). Translate into Lean4 using Mathlib and end the Lean statement with := by sorry.

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ with |z| < 1. Show that ∑_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n = |z|/(1-|z|). -/
theorem tsum_geometric_of_abs_lt_one {z : ℂ} (hz : |z| < 1) :
  ∑' n : ℕ, |z| ^ n = |z| / (1 - |z|) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ with |z| < 1. Show that ∑_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n = |z|/(1-|z|). -/
theorem tsum_abs_geometric_complex {z : ℂ} (hz : |z| < 1) :
  ∑' n : ℕ, |z| ^ (n + 1) = |z| / (1 - |z|) := by
  sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let z ∈ ℂ with |z| < 1. Show that ∑_{n=1}^∞ |z|^n = |z|/(1-|z|). -/
theorem tsum_abs_geometric_complex {z : ℂ} (hz : Complex.abs z < 1) :
  ∑' n : ℕ, (Complex.abs z) ^ (n + 1) = Complex.abs z / (1 - Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry
